results.text: በዝሆኑ ባለቤቶች ጌታህ እንዴት እንደሠራ አላወቅህምን?
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: በእነርሱም ላይ መንጎች የኾኑን ዎፎች ላከ፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: ከተጠበሰ ጭቃ በኾነ ድንጋይ የምትወረውርባቸው የኾነችን፤ (አዕዋፍ)፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
